rooms.name: GreenStreet
rooms.description: You are on Green Street, outside Hendrick House.

rooms.name: MainEntrance
rooms.description: You are in the main entrance of Hendrick House. You can see the front desk, stairs leading to the basement, and hallways to the east and west buildings.

rooms.name: FrontDesk
rooms.description: You are at the front desk, where you can find lovely staffs who can assist you with pretty much anything.

rooms.name: BasementStairs
rooms.description: You are on the stairs leading to the basement. You can see the basement lounge.

rooms.name: BasementLounge
rooms.description: You are in the basement lounge. There are study tables and seats. You can see the computer room and a hallway leading to the east laundry room, the gym, and the east elevators.

rooms.name: ComputerRoom
rooms.description: You are in the computer room. You see 3 desktops and that's pretty much it.

rooms.name: EastBasementHallway
rooms.description: You are in the east basement hallway. You can see the east laundry room, the gym, and the east elevators.

rooms.name: EastLaundryRoom
rooms.description: You are in the east laundry room.  There are 4 washers and dryers. And piles of clothes, dirty and clean.

rooms.name: EastElevatorsBasementFloor
rooms.description: You are in one of the two elevators of the east building. The close and open door buttons do not work and the elevators are heckin' slow :') However you can go up up to 6th floor.

rooms.name: Gym
rooms.description: You are in the gym. As you can tell, it's a pretty jank gym. But it works well with covid cuz it's private and is relatively less exposed to covid.

rooms.name: EastHallway
rooms.description: You are in the east hallway. You see the cafeteria and the east lounge.

rooms.name: Cafeteria
rooms.description: You are in the cafeteria. You see a long line of people waiting to get food. You also see the east elevators.

rooms.name: EastElevatorsFirstFloor
rooms.description: You are in one of the two elevators of the east building. The close and open door buttons do not work and the elevators are heckin' slow :') However you can go up up to 6th floor and down to basement.

rooms.name: EastLounge
rooms.description: You are in the east lounge. You see a pool table, a couch, and a TV.

rooms.name: WestHallway
rooms.description: You are in the west hallway. You see the west lounge.

rooms.name: WestLounge
rooms.description: You are in the west lounge. There are 4 study tables and you can see the west elevators.

rooms.name: WestElevatorsFirstFloor
rooms.description: You are in one of the two west elevators. The better elevators :') The buttons actually work and the elevators are pretty fast. They go up the seventh floor and down to the basement.

rooms.name: WestElevatorsSeventhFloor
rooms.description: You are in one of the two west elevators. The better elevators :') The buttons actually work and the elevators are pretty fast. They go up the seventh floor and down to the basement.

rooms.name: Room1705
rooms.description: You are in room 1705 of the west building of Hendrick House! Yay you made it!
